sources.title: Misc 1057 Geography Of The Japanese Empire
sources.description: U.S. Army 1945 training film # MISC-1057 // Geography Of The Japanese Empire. Description . Reel 1, maps indicate the size of Japan and Japan s expansion in Asia and in the Pacific area. Shows a waterfall, mountains, streams and lakes, the seacoast, and volcanoes. Reel 2 shows street scenes in Tokyo, Nagoya, and Yokohama. Contrasts modern and classical Japanese buildings. Shows rivers and harbors, Nagoya castle, the National Theater and Imperial Hotel in Tokyo, seals and sea birds on a beach, aerial views of a sulphur mine, panoramic views of a fishing fleet in a harbor, and Mount Fujiama.
